trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SEQ_00<tab>Xeerol Ja is ready to bring another juice to fruition.

TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SEQ_01<tab>Xeerol Ja has tasked you with creating prickly pear juice.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 260. Delivering items with a rating of 530 or more will earn greater rewards.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the prickly pear juice to Xeerol Ja. Since you have some time before the tasting party, you may wish to hone your craft.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_TODO_00<tab>Deliver prickly pear juice to Xeerol Ja.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The Long Road to Xak Tural.”
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_HALNARUK_100_000<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh! Xeerol Ja's spirits seem airylight! Thanks to Halnaruk's juicypulp, yes?
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_010<tab>Perfect timing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_011<tab>I've got a plan for the Pelupelu prototype. Do you have a moment to spare?
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_012<tab>Recall that fellow in Wachunpelo who was out of sorts after overindulging in mezcal.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_100_012<tab>You see it all the time in Tuliyollal─Pelupelu merchants sharing a bottle or two, and then those who can't help but drink their better sense away.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_013<tab>Water is a foolproof companion to alcohol, but perhaps we might offer a juice that addresses the headaches and nausea come the following day.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_HALNARUK_000_014<tab>A remedy for sickfeels is sure to appeal to tipsy Pelupelu! But what ingredients would we need for the craftymaking?
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_015<tab>In addition to the hydration water provides, certain vitamins and minerals may prove essential to relieving symptoms.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_016<tab>The tunas found in Shaaloani, for instance, are brimming with nutrients.

TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_017<tab>But you're from across the salt, aren't you? Forgive me─sometimes I forget. When I say “tunas,” I mean the fruits of our nopalitenders. I trust you saw a few of those little cacti scurrying about when you went to Shaaloani?

TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_100_017<tab>I'm glad we didn't lose you to Xak Tural. There are so many wonders to be had up there, I wouldn't have been surprised if my little juice stand slipped your mind entirely.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_110_017<tab>But I digress! I heard from a native Xak Turali that nopalitender tunas provide just the sort of relief we're looking for.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_018<tab>Apparently, some peoples up north eat tunas for breakfast after a long night of drinking. A natural cure to the aftereffects of alcohol!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_019<tab>By using these fruits in our next juice, we might offer the Pelupelu just the cure they need!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_HALNARUK_000_020<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh! With a curedrink for achy braincases, Pelupelu can drinkdrunk without worry!

TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_021<tab>I have every faith in your skill, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Blend us a batch of juice made from the tunas of nopalitenders, and add whatever you think might ease the “achy braincase” of a Pelupelu.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_023<tab>In the meantime, I'll be hard at work selling the juices we've made together. Let me know when you have a sample ready!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_HALNARUK_000_030<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh. If this juicymix can relieve sickfeels, more than just Pelupelu will be eager to siptaste.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_031<tab>Extract the juice from nopalitender tunas─er, would you prefer I call them prickly pears?─and feel free to add vitamins and minerals as you see fit.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_032<tab>Lovely, thank you! We'll have our tasting once a full batch is prepared.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_033<tab>I can tell by scent alone that our Pelupelu customers will be thrilled! We'll have our tasting once a full batch is prepared.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_034<tab>Lovely, thank you! Now, Ropli has agreed to be our taster─let me go and fetch him.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_035<tab>I can tell by scent alone that our Pelupelu customers will be thrilled! Now, Ropli has agreed to be our taster─let me go and fetch him.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_040<tab>A juice blend bespoke to the Pelupelu palate? Don't mind if I do...
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_041<tab>Well, clip my wool and call me an alpaca─this is delicious! Intensely sweet, yet satisfying to swallow!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_042<tab>I'm so glad! It's meant to be a morning drink─specifically after a night of revelry.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_043<tab>A relief for the maladies of merriment! Now that's a sublime idea. I'd wager even folks from across the salt are no stranger to such illnesses.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_044<tab>I myself enjoy a good drink for both business and pleasure, but I always dread the blinding headaches and discomfort the next day.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_045<tab>The same goes for plenty of Pelupelu─so a beverage that offers succor to the more enthusiastic of our number is a godssend indeed.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_046<tab>Thank you. Your creation shows us a kindness that has me eager to test out its efficacy at once.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_A1_000_001<tab>Moderation is key.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_A1_000_002<tab>You'll be drinking them all under the table in no time!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_A1_000_003<tab>Whose juice do I have to mix to get an invitation?
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_047<tab>I do my best not to overindulge, but, well, as drink pours, so flies judgment. Knowing this juice will be here to soak up any regrets is a great comfort.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_048<tab>A fellow reveler, I take it? Then allow me to extend you an invitation as soon as the next opportunity presents itself.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_052<tab>When your rent began drying up, I couldn't help but worry. But I am happy to see that Xeerol Ja Juicecraft is flourishing here in Wachumeqimeqi.

TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_053<tab>I'm deeply sorry about the late payments... But as you can see, my financial situation has improved significantly thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s help in expanding my menu.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_054<tab>Given our diverse selection of drinks, I was hoping we might hold a tasting party in the city sometime.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_055<tab>A juice for everyone in Wachumeqimeqi! My gesture of thanks to the community and contrition for all the times I failed to be timely with my rent.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_056<tab>Be honest─you're just eager for folks to taste your creations, aren't you?
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_057<tab><sigh> You're right! I'm proud of our work, and I'd like the city to taste the fruits of our labor.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_ROPLI_000_058<tab>That's the spirit. I'll make the arrangements.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_HALNARUK_000_059<tab>Sippyparty will need lots of juicymix─and for lots of juicymix, we need lots of mixybits! Halnaruk will stuffseek until his pack is bursting!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_XEEROLJA_000_060<tab>A tasting party of our very own! I can hardly wait─oh, there's so much to do! But leave the planning to me─I'll be in touch with the details very soon!

TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SYSTEM_000_061<tab>Xeerol Ja is thrilled with your efforts. She now considers you a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Pelupelu Panacea Provider<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SYSTEM_000_062<tab>The next quest will be available from Xeerol Ja upon reaching level 100 as an alchemist or culinarian.
TEXT_KINGLA306_04987_SYSTEM_000_063<tab>In order to undertake the subsequent quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The Protector and the Destroyer.”
